bookPages:
Angels
Angels have been the subject of myths among the modern races of Solinia for countless aeons. Some believe they are holy beings and pay homage to them in various religous texts and others say they are merely stories told to give people hope

and strength in times of turmoil. 
The fact of the matter is that the Angels are alive and well and have been so for longer than any other race on Solinia, they are descended from the Tinai and are spoken of in the Ancient Texts surrounding the horrific

events that took place during the Cataclysm.
The (very) ancient Genesis story provides more information about this fabled race who have returned to bring their god Methabeht back to Solinia.
